Name: Fatiao发条：自动化工具
About the game: What can the clockwork do With the development and progress of science and technology, automation is the future trend. Clockwork can make the user's repeated or complex mouse and keyboard actions, identifying pictures, and other actions into quick commands, which can assist the elderly, young or disabled to use computers conveniently; it can improve personal work efficiency and collective productivity; release non-technical repetitive labor . 'Shortcut instruction' APP in IOS-like system. Clockwork basic operation 1. Drag and drop files or paste file links to open the command production process. 2. The left mouse button can drag the current line sequence; double-click to edit the current line; select the current line to insert a new action. 3. Delete key to delete the current line; space to disable or enable the current line;Enter to add a space in the next line. 4. Hold down the Ctrl mouse on the keyboard to click multiple selection rows, hold down the Shift mouse to select multiple rows in batches. 5. The shortcut key Ctrl+C can copy the selected current line; Ctrl+V can cut the selected current line; Ctrl+V can paste the current line in the next line selected. 6. Call the floating window: double-click the floating window to show/hide the clockwork, right-click the floating window to expand the menu.
